item.description:
The Solas is in the Lennox Hotel.
The Barflies will be playing on the Second floor of the Solas.

Solas/Lennox Hotel

They list on the Mike's Myspace Website that they start about 8pm, But when I called there I was told they start playing at 9pm.

The barflies are typically a duo featuring Mike Hermans on Guitar, George Chinaglia on Bass.
They do have a female vocalist sit in for some portion of the songs when they play too.
They play primarily top 40 rock and blues tunes from artists like U2, Toto, Stevie Wonder, Lou Reed, Asia, the Beatles and the Police for example.
Stop in for a drink and relax for awhile at the Solas on a Tuesday night.

If you are interested the Solas serves food till at least 11pm I believe, not a bad place to get a bite to eat before the show. There is also good Mexican food, and other dinning choices close by.
If there is enough interest we could make plans to get something to eat either at the Solas or elsewhere.

Let me if your interested in gettting something to eat before the show.
Hope to Meetup with some of you there.
E-mail me if you have any questions...
item.how_to_find_us: The Solas is a small venue. I will be upstairs at the second floor bar where the Barflies will be playing.
item.why: Mike and George usually play some good tunes and have established a Tuesday night residency now at the Solas. They play almost every Tuesday night. Come out, stop in for a few drinks or a bite to eat and see this Free Show.
item.name: The Barflies @ the Solas
